name: Bitterleaf Leaf (T1)
description: A hardy medicinal leaf used as a base herb.

name: Sunpetal Bloom (T1)
description: A fragrant bloom prized for restorative properties.
use: Healing draughts, buff elixirs, fine teas.

name: Ironroot Root (T1)
description: A dense root with strong stabilizing qualities.

name: Ghostspore Spore (T1)
description: A powdery spore with volatile reactions.

name: Amberresin Resin (T1)
description: Sticky resin that binds and preserves mixtures.

name: Verdant Essence (T1)
description: Concentrated plant magic captured in a vial.

name: Wildseed Seed of Power (T1)
description: A rare seed humming with latent growth magic.
